channel.title: Root on COTTON
channel.description: Recent content in Root on COTTON

item.title: GaJAZ1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cotton_A_11862 Gene Symbol: GaJAZ1 Gene Name: Genome: Gossypium hirsutum L.

item.title: GbNRX1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GbNRX1 Gene Name: nucleoredoxin 1 Genome: Species: Gossypium barbadense Functional Descriptions: The Thioredoxin GbNRX1 Plays a Crucial Role in Homeostasis of Apoplastic Reactive Oxygen Species in Response to Verticillium dahliae Infection in Cotton.

item.title: GhAPX
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhAPX Gene Name: Genome: Cotton Genome Database Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Root growth of GhAPX-overexpressing Arabidopsis subjected to abiotic stress.

item.title: GhBZR3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_A10G0312 Gene Symbol: GhBZR3 Gene Name: Genome: genome version is NBI v1.

item.title: GhCDPK28-A10
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_A10G086300 Gene Symbol: GhCDPK28-A10 Gene Name: Genome: genomes of G.

item.title: GhCERP
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D02G2021 Gene Symbol: GhCERP Gene Name: Genome: cotton genome (Gossypium hirsutum, NAU) Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Inter-species functional analysis of the BR-mediated BES1-CERP-EXPA3 signaling cascade also promotes Arabidopsis root and hypocotyl growth.

item.title: GhEXPA3-1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D04G1924 Gene Symbol: GhEXPA3-1 Gene Name: Genome: cotton genome (Gossypium hirsutum, NAU) Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: GhBES1 directly binds to E-box of GhCERP and regulates the transcription of GhCERP, which further binds to E-box of GhEXPA3-1 to enhance its transcription to promote plant cell elongation.

item.title: GhHAK5aA
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_A01G1516 Gene Symbol: GhHAK5aA Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: The Cotton High-Affinity K+ Transporter, GhHAK5a, Is Essential for Shoot Regulation of K+ Uptake in Root under Potassium Deficiency.

item.title: GhHAK5aD
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D01G1760 Gene Symbol: GhHAK5aD Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: The Cotton High-Affinity K+ Transporter, GhHAK5a, Is Essential for Shoot Regulation of K+ Uptake in Root under Potassium Deficiency.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Ghir_D05G01221 Gene Symbol: Ghir_D05G01221 Gene Name: Genome: G.

item.title: GhMKK3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhMKK3 Gene Name: Mitogen-Activated Protein Kinase Kinase 3 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: The Cotton Mitogen-Activated Protein Kinase Kinase 3 (GhMKK3) Functions in Drought Tolerance by Regulating Stomatal Responses and Root Growth.

item.title: GhMLP28
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhMLP28 Gene Name: Major Latex Protein 28 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Cotton Major Latex Protein 28 (GhMLP28) Functions as a Positive Regulator of the Ethylene Responsive Factor 6 (GhERF6) in Defense against Verticillium dahliae.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhVIP1 Gene Name: bZIP transcription factor 1 Genome: cotton genome (G.

item.title: GhWRKY17
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhWRKY17 Gene Name: WRKY transcription factor 17 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: The Cotton WRKY Transcription Factor GhWRKY17 Functions in Drought and Salt Stress in Transgenic Nicotiana benthamiana Through ABA Signaling and the Modulation of Reactive Oxygen Species Production.
